title: DDFP 408: Week 12 review & Matt Hasselbeck vs. Andrew Luck
itunes:title: DDFP 408: Week 12 review & Matt Hasselbeck vs. Andrew Luck
description:
Shek is joined by Maurice Jones-Drew and Ike Taylor to recap the Week 12 matchup between the Steelers and Seahawks, as well as discuss the quarterback situations in Indianapolis and Denver. Then, the guys discuss Kobe Bryant's retirement, where he ranks among the all-time best players in the NBA and what it's like to play with an aging superstar. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
